project.teaser: Powder is the only app offering a complete turnkey solution to automatically detect the best gaming moments, earn rewards from quests, and compete with other gamers.As a deep tech company, we invest in self-supervised machine learning techniques for highlight detection...
project.objective: Powder is the only app offering a complete turnkey solution to automatically detect the best gaming moments, earn rewards from quests, and compete with other gamers. As a deep tech company, we invest in self-supervised machine learning techniques for highlight detection, surpassing state-of-the-art. In a market set to surpass three billion gamers by 2023, with steady yearly growth in the last seven years (5.6%), Powder brings disruptive innovation to the market by empowering every gamer to become a content creator and socialize with their peers through clips and challenges. As their virtual lives get richer, and lifestyle gaming becomes a daily activity, gamers are increasingly looking for ways to make the most of their meaningful moments in the virtual worlds. Powder empowers every gamer with a platform that puts the users interests at his core, challenging the existing social media models by proudly committing to delivering a stronger, fairer, more digital, and more resilient Europe.
project.title: Powder is the only app offering a complete turnkey solution to automatically detect the best gaming moments, earn rewards from quests and challenges, and compete with other gamers.
project.keywords: content creation,Game detection AI,E-sports,recommendation system,moderation AI,game highlights,editing engine,metadata,Convolutional neuronal network,self-supervised learning,Emotions recognition,Web,Video editing,PC,mobile,cross-platform,creators economy,gaming content,metaverse,disruptive innovation,videogames,machine learning,Game Studios,artificial intelligence

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as Digital transition).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europes financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europes financial contribution to Europes biodiversitys path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
